summary: A mod which adds mithril ores, ingots, vines and a forge where you can craft them to weapons!
descriptionHtml:
[i][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]NOTE: I'm forced to stop my project modding for a few time, because i've some problems. thank you for understanding this.[/size][/color][/b][/i]








Vodahmin's Mithrilforge BETA_001

I'm not good at writing lyrics, so do not expect much.

i've got 4 points:

1.[u][b]THIS MOD ONLY MAKES SENCE WITH THE Edhildils Mithril Blades MOD!! so first install that![/b][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37578/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37578/?[/url]

2. theres no quest. to find the forge (the thing where says where it is) you just have to swim a bit in front of the dragonreach castle.

3. you still can craft the mithril weapons at normal forges, until i foud out how to fix that.

4. i'm from germany, so maybe there's somewhere bad english, sorry about that.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
used tools:
- only creation kit

Version details:

-added Mithril ore & ingots
-added th mithrilforge

If you find any bugs or things i should make better, pls PM me on Nexusmods: VodahminVulom






















END OF THE LINE

:D
author: VodahminVulom
